GR12hsasvrpu:715: vijānāti na vijñānam ekam arthadvayaṃ tathā // HSvs_[4.6]332 //
GR12hsasvrpu:717: no bādhakaṃ na caikena dvayor gahaṇam asty adaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]333 //
GR12hsasvrpu:719: kadācid api yukto yad ataḥ katham abādhakam // HSvs_[4.6]334 //
GR12hsasvrpu:721: na dhūmādigrahād eva hy analādigatiḥ katham // HSvs_[4.6]335 //
GR12hsasvrpu:723: tulyayor api tadbhāve hanta kvacid adarśanāt // HSvs_[4.6]336 //
GR12hsasvrpu:725: aughāt taddhetuviṣayaṃ na tv evam itarasya ca // HSvs_[4.6]337 //
GR12hsasvrpu:727: so 'py evaṃ na ca taddhetos tajjñānād api tadgatiḥ // HSvs_[4.6]338 //
GR12hsasvrpu:728: tajjñānaṃ yan na vai dhūma-jñānasya samanantaraḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:729: tathābhūd ity ato neha tajjñānād api tadgatiḥ // HSvs_[4.6]339 //
GR12hsasvrpu:730: tatheti hanta ko nv arthaḥ tattathābhāvato yadi /
GR12hsasvrpu:731: itaratraikam evetthaṃ jñānaṃ tadgrāhi bhāvyatām // HSvs_[4.6]340 //
GR12hsasvrpu:735: tathā vikalpakṛn nānyad iti pratyuktam iṣyatām // HSvs_[4.6]342 //
GR12hsasvrpu:736: ataḥ kathaṃcid ekena tayor agrahaṇe sati /
GR12hsasvrpu:740: na pūrvam uttaraṃ ceha tadanyāgrahaṇād dhruvam /
GR12hsasvrpu:741: gṛhyate 'ta idaṃ nāto na tv atīndriyadarśanam // HSvs_[4.6]345 //
GR12hsasvrpu:742: vikalpo 'pi tathā nyāyād yujyate na hy anīdṛśaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:745: mādhyasthyam avalambyaitat cintyatāṃ svayam eva tu // HSvs_[4.6]347 //
GR12hsasvrpu:747: vrajaty ākārabhedena kuto bodhānvayas tataḥ // HSvs_[4.6]348 //
GR12hsasvrpu:750: svasaṃvedanasiddhatvāt na ca bhrānto 'yam ity api /
GR12hsasvrpu:753: asya ca bhrāntatāyāṃ yat tat tatheti na yuktimat // HSvs_[4.6]351 //
GR12hsasvrpu:759: yataś ceṣṭas tato nāsmāt tatrāsaṃdigdhaniścayaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]354 //
GR12hsasvrpu:761: tasyaiva bhāvo nānyo yaj janyāc ca jananaṃ tathā // HSvs_[4.6]355 //
GR12hsasvrpu:763: tad eva hi yato bhāvaḥ sa cetarasamāśrayaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]356 //
GR12hsasvrpu:764: ity evam anvayāpattiḥ śabdārthād eva jāyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:765: anyathā kalpanaṃ cāsya sarvathā nyāyabādhitam // HSvs_[4.6]357 //
GR12hsasvrpu:767: vyāpāro 'pi na tasyāpi nāpekṣāsattvataḥ kvacit // HSvs_[4.6]358 //
GR12hsasvrpu:770: (7) buddhavacanoṃ kī sahāyatā se kṣaṇikavāda kā khaṃḍana kiñcanyāt kṣaṇikatve va ārṣo 'rtho 'pi virudhyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:771: virodhāpādanaṃ cāsya nālpasya tamasaḥ phalam // HSvs_[4.7]360 //
GR12hsasvrpu:772: ita ekanavate kalpe śaktyā me puruṣo hataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:773: tena karmavipākena pāde viddho 'smi bhikṣavaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]361 //
GR12hsasvrpu:775: svayam āptena yat tad vaḥ ko 'yaṃ kṣaṇikatāgrahaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]362 //
GR12hsasvrpu:777: sa hetuphalabhāvo yat tan me iti na saṃgatam // HSvs_[4.7]363 //
GR12hsasvrpu:779: nātra pramāṇam atyakṣā tadvivakṣā yato matā // HSvs_[4.7]364 //
GR12hsasvrpu:780: taddeśanā pramāṇaṃ cet na sānyārthā bhaviṣyati /
GR12hsasvrpu:781: tatrāpi kiṃ pramāṇaṃ ced idaṃ pūrvoktam ārṣakam // HSvs_[4.7]365 //
GR12hsasvrpu:782: tathānyad api yat kalpa-sthāyinī pṛthivī kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:783: uktā bhagavatā bhikṣūn āmantrya svayam eva tu // HSvs_[4.7]366 //
GR12hsasvrpu:784: pañca bāhyā dvivijñeyā ity anyad api cārṣakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:789: gṛhītagrahaṇād evaṃ mithyā tathāgataṃ vacaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]369 //
GR12hsasvrpu:791: yadrūpādi tatas tatra manojñānaṃ pravartate // HSvs_[4.7]370 //
GR12hsasvrpu:793: pañcānām api cen nyāyād etad apy asamañjasam // HSvs_[4.7]371 //
GR12hsasvrpu:796: sattve 'pi nendriyajñānaṃ hanta tad gocaraṃ matam /
GR12hsasvrpu:797: dvivijñeyatvam ity evaṃ kṣaṇabhede na tattvataḥ // HSvs_[4.7]373 //
GR12hsasvrpu:799: tathāpy ūrdhvaṃ viśeṣeṇa kiñcit tatrāpi vakṣyate // HSvs_[4.7]374 //
GR12hsasvrpu:800: pāṃcavāṃ stabaka (1)bāhyārthakhaṃḍana khaṃḍana vijñānamātravādo 'pi na samyagupapadyate
GR12hsasvrpu:801: mānaṃ yat tattvataḥ kiñcid arthābhāve na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]375 //
GR12hsasvrpu:802: na pratyakṣaṃ yato 'bhāvā-lambanaṃ na tad iṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:807: eṣāṃ ca tatsvabhāvatve tasyāsiddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]378 //
GR12hsasvrpu:809: janayaty eva saty evam anyathātatsvabhāvatā // HSvs_[5.1]379 //
GR12hsasvrpu:811: hantaivam api siddho vaḥ kadācid upalabdhitaḥ // HSvs_[5.1]380 //
GR12hsasvrpu:813: na hi loke 'śvam āṣādeḥ siddhā paktyādiyogyatā // HSvs_[5.1]381 //
GR12hsasvrpu:814: parābhiprāyato hy etad evaṃ ced ucyate na yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:816: atadgrahaṇabhāvaiś ca yadi nāma na gṛhyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:818: vijñānaṃ yat svasaṃvedyaṃ na tvartho yuktyayogataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:819: atas tadvedane tasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]384 //
GR12hsasvrpu:821: ataḥ kimucyate mānam arthābhāve na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]385 //
GR12hsasvrpu:823: tadvedane grahas tasya tataḥ kiṃ nopapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]386 //
GR12hsasvrpu:826: jñānamātre tu vijñānaṃ jñānam evety ado bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:827: pravṛttyādi tato na syāt prasiddhaṃ lokaśāstrayoḥ // HSvs_[5.1]388 //
GR12hsasvrpu:834: virodhān nobhayākāram anyathā tad asad bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:835: niḥsvabhāvatvatas tasya sattaivaṃ yujyate katham // HSvs_[5.1]392 //
GR12hsasvrpu:837: akarmakaṃ tathā caitat svayam eva prakāśate // HSvs_[5.1]393 //
GR12hsasvrpu:838: yathāste śeta ity ādau vinā karma sa eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:839: tathocyate jagaty asmiṃs tathā jñānam apīṣyatām // HSvs_[5.1]394 //
GR12hsasvrpu:840: ucyate sāṃpratam adaḥ svayam eva vicintyatām /
GR12hsasvrpu:841: pramāṇābhāvatas tatra yady etad upapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]395 //
GR12hsasvrpu:842: evaṃ na yat tadātmānam api hanta prakāśayet /
GR12hsasvrpu:843: atas tad itthaṃ no yuktam anyathā na vyavasthitiḥ // HSvs_[5.1]396 //
GR12hsasvrpu:845: dhruvaṃ yatas tato 'karmakatvam asya kathaṃ bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]397 //
GR12hsasvrpu:846: vyavasthāpakam asyaivaṃ bhrāntaṃ caitat tu bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:847: tathety abhrāntam atrāpi nanu mānaṃ na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]398 //
GR12hsasvrpu:849: dṛṣṭā taimirikādīnām akṣādāv iti cen na tat // HSvs_[5.1]399 //
GR12hsasvrpu:851: bhrāntaṃ tasya tathābhāve bhrāntasyābhrāntatā bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]400 //
GR12hsasvrpu:852: na ca prakāśamātraṃ tu loke kvacid akarmakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:853: dīpādau yujyate nyāyād ataś caitad apārthakam // HSvs_[5.1]401 //
GR12hsasvrpu:855: na ca sādhyasya yat tena śabdamātram asāv api // HSvs_[5.1]402 //
GR12hsasvrpu:858: viśeṣo vidyate kaścit tathā caitad vṛthoditam // HSvs_[5.2]403 //
GR12hsasvrpu:860: tad eva tair vinirmuktaṃ bhavānta iti kathyate // HSvs_[5.2]404 //
GR12hsasvrpu:861: rāgādikleśavargo yan na vijñānāt pṛthag mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:862: ekāntaikasvabhāve ca tasmin kiṃ kena vāsitam // HSvs_[5.2]405 //
GR12hsasvrpu:863: kliṣṭaṃ vijñānam evāsau kliṣṭatā tasya yadvaśāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:864: nīlyādivad asau vastu tadvad eva prasajyate // HSvs_[5.2]406 //
GR12hsasvrpu:865: muktau ca tasya bhedena bhāvaḥ syāt paṭaśuddhivat /
GR12hsasvrpu:867: prakṛtyaiva tathābhūtaṃ tad eva kliṣṭateti cet /
GR12hsasvrpu:869: asaty api ca yā bāhye grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇā /
GR12hsasvrpu:870: dvicandrabhrāntivad bhrāntir iyaṃ naḥ kliṣṭateti cet // HSvs_[5.2]409 //
GR12hsasvrpu:872: iyaṃ syāt timirābhāve na hīndudvayadarśanam // HSvs_[5.2]410 //
GR12hsasvrpu:873: na cāsad eva taddhetur bodhamātraṃ na cāpi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:874: sadaiva kliṣṭatāpatter iti muktir na yujyate // HSvs_[5.2]411 //
GR12hsasvrpu:875: muktyabhāve ca sarvaiva nanu cintā nirarthikā /
GR12hsasvrpu:876: bhāve 'pi sarvadā tasyāḥ samyag etat vicintyatām // HSvs_[5.2]412 //
GR12hsasvrpu:878: prājñasyābhineveśo na tasmād atrāpi yujyate // HSvs_[5.2]413 //
GR12hsasvrpu:879: chaṭhā stabaka (1) nirhetuka vināśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ yaccoktaṃ pūrvam atraiva kṣaṇikatvaprasādhakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:880: nāśahetor ayogādi tad idānīṃ parīkṣyate // HSvs_[6.1]414 //
GR12hsasvrpu:881: hetoḥ syān naśvaro bhāvo 'naśvaro vā vikalpya yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:882: nāśahetor ayogitvam ucyate tan na yuktimat // HSvs_[6.1]415 //
GR12hsasvrpu:883: hetuṃ pratītya yad asau tathā naśvara iṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:887: na punaḥ kriyate kiñcit tenāsya sahakāriṇā /
GR12hsasvrpu:888: samānakālabhāvitvāt tathā coktam idaṃ tava // HSvs_[6.1]418 //
GR12hsasvrpu:889: upakārī virodhī ca sahakārī ca yo mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:891: sahakārikṛto hetor viśeṣo nāsti yady api /
GR12hsasvrpu:896: apekṣāyāṃ niyuṅkte yat kāryametad vṛthoditam // HSvs_[6.1]422 //
GR12hsasvrpu:898: bhāvahetuṃ samāśritya nanu nyāyān nidarśitam // HSvs_[6.1]423 //
GR12hsasvrpu:900: nāśyamāśritya nāśasya kriyate yad vicakṣaṇaiḥ // HSvs_[6.1]424 //
GR12hsasvrpu:901: kiñca nirhetuke nāśe hiṃsakatvaṃ na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:902: vyāpādyate sadā yasmān na kaścit kenacit kvacit // HSvs_[6.1]425 //
GR12hsasvrpu:904: hiṃsakas tan na santāna-samutpatter asaṃbhavāt // HSvs_[6.1]426 //
GR12hsasvrpu:906: na stastadadharmatvāc ca hetus tatprabhave kutaḥ // HSvs_[6.1]427 //
GR12hsasvrpu:909: hanmyenam iti saṃkleśād hiṃsakaś cet prakalpyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:910: naivaṃ tvannītito yasmād ayam eva na yujyate // HSvs_[6.1]429 //
GR12hsasvrpu:911: saṃkleśo yad guṇotpādaḥ sa cākliṣṭān na kevalāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:913: taṃ prāpya tatsvabhāvatvāt tataḥ sa iti cen nanu /
GR12hsasvrpu:914: nāśahetum avāpyaivaṃ nāśapakṣe 'pi na kṣatiḥ // HSvs_[6.1]431 //
GR12hsasvrpu:916: evam āhur ahetutvaṃ janakasyāpi sarvathā // HSvs_[6.1]432 //
GR12hsasvrpu:922: asiddhes tatra nītyā tad vyavahāraniṣedhataḥ // HSvs_[6.1]435 //
GR12hsasvrpu:925: (2) arthakriyākāritva se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:928: arthakriyā yato 'sau vā tadanyā vā dvayī gatiḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:929: tattve na tatra sāmarthyam anyatas tatsamudbhavāt // HSvs_[6.2]438 //
GR12hsasvrpu:931: na ca nāśe 'pi sadyuktyā taddhetos tatsamudbhavāt // HSvs_[6.2]439 //
GR12hsasvrpu:933: tato 'nyabhāva evaitan nāsau nyāyyo dalaṃ vinā // HSvs_[6.2]440 //
GR12hsasvrpu:934: nāsat sat jāyate yasmād anyasattvasthitāv api /
GR12hsasvrpu:935: tasyaiva tu tathābhāve nanv asiddho 'nvayaḥ katham // HSvs_[6.2]441 //
GR12hsasvrpu:936: bhūtir yaiṣāṃ kriyā soktā na cāsau yujyate kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:938: na cātītasya sāmarthyaṃ tasyām iti nidarśitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:939: na cānyo laukikaḥ kaścic chabdārtho 'tretyayuktimat // HSvs_[6.2]443 //
GR12hsasvrpu:940: (3) rūparūpāntaraṇa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:944: pariṇāmaḥ pramāsiddhaḥ iṣṭaś ca khalu paṇḍitaiḥ // HSvs_[6.3]445 //
GR12hsasvrpu:946: etat tad eva na bhavaty ato 'nyatve dhruvo 'nvayaḥ // HSvs_[6.3]446 //
GR12hsasvrpu:947: tad eva na bhavaty etat tac ca na bhavatīti ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:948: viruddhaṃ hanta kiṃcānyad ādimat tat prasajyate // HSvs_[6.3]447 //
GR12hsasvrpu:949: kṣīranāśaś ca dadhy eva yad dṛṣṭaṃ gorasānvitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:950: na tu tailādyataḥ siddha pariṇamo 'nvayāvahaḥ // HSvs_[6.3]448 //
GR12hsasvrpu:951: nāsat sajjāyate jātu sac cāsat sarvathaiva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:953: nityetaradato nyāyāt tat tathābhāvato hi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:955: (4)antatogāmī nāśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:957: tasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvāt yujyate na kadācana // HSvs_[6.4]451 //
GR12hsasvrpu:962: etad apy asad eveti sadṛśo bhinna eva yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:963: bhedāgrahe kathaṃ tasya tatsvabhāvatvato grahaḥ // HSvs_[6.4]454 //
GR12hsasvrpu:964: tadarthaniyato 'sau yad bhedam anyāgrahād hi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:965: na gṛhṇātīti cet tulyaḥ so 'pareṇa kuto gatiḥ // HSvs_[6.4]455 //
GR12hsasvrpu:966: tathāgater abhāve ca vacas tuccham idaṃ nanu /
GR12hsasvrpu:969: anvayi jñānam eṣṭavyaṃ sarvaṃ tat kṣaṇikaṃ kutaḥ // HSvs_[6.4]457 //
GR12hsasvrpu:970: jñānena gṛhyate cārtho na cāpi paradarśane /
GR12hsasvrpu:971: tadabhāve tu tadbhāvāt kadācid api tattvataḥ // HSvs_[6.4]458 //
GR12hsasvrpu:973: tadā tat tasya jānāti kṣaṇikatvaṃ kathaṃ nanu // HSvs_[6.4]459 //
GR12hsasvrpu:975: yathā nīlādi tādrūpyān naitan mithyātvasaṃśayāt // HSvs_[6.4]460 //
GR12hsasvrpu:979: sarvam evāviśeṣeṇa vijñānaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yataḥ // HSvs_[6.4]462 //
GR12hsasvrpu:980: tathā citrasvabhāvatvān na cārthasya na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:982: (5) kṣaṇikavāda tathā vijñānavāda ke pratipādana kā eka saṃbhava āśayaviśeṣa anye tv abhidadhaty evam etad āsthānivṛttaye /
GR12hsasvrpu:983: kṣaṇikaṃ sarvam eveti buddhenoktaṃ na tattvataḥ // HSvs_[6.5]464 //
GR12hsasvrpu:985: vineyān kāṃścid āśritya yad vā tad deśanārhataḥ // HSvs_[6.5]465 //
GR12hsasvrpu:986: na caitad api na nyāyyaṃ yato buddho mahāmuniḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:987: suvaidyavad vinā kāryaṃ dravyāsatyaṃ na bhāṣate // HSvs_[6.5]466 //
GR12hsasvrpu:989: bruvate śūnyam anye tu sarvam eva vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:990: na nityaṃ nāpy anityaṃ yad vastu yuktyopapadyate // HSvs_[6.6]467 //
GR12hsasvrpu:992: anityam api cotpāda-vyayābhāvān na jātucit // HSvs_[6.6]468 //
GR12hsasvrpu:995: atrāpy abhidadhaty anye kim itthaṃ tattvasādhanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:996: pramāṇaṃ vidyate kiñcid āhosvicchūnyam eva hi // HSvs_[6.6]470 //
GR12hsasvrpu:997: śūnyaṃ cet susthitaṃ tattvam asti cec chūnyatā katham /
GR12hsasvrpu:998: tasyaiva nanu sadbhāvād iti samyag vicintyatām // HSvs_[6.6]471 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1000: anyathā neti suvyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam // HSvs_[6.6]472 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1001: uktaṃ vihāya mānaṃ cec chūnyatāny asya vastunaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1002: śūnyatve pratipādyasya nanu vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ // HSvs_[6.6]473 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1005: yāvatām asti tanmānaṃ pratipādyās tathā ca ye /
GR12hsasvrpu:1006: santi te sarva eveti prabhūtānām aśūnyatā // HSvs_[6.6]475 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1008: abhiprāyata ity ukto lakṣyate tattvavedinā // HSvs_[6.6]476 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1009: sātavāṃ stabaka (1) jainasammata nityānityatvavāda kā samarthana anye tv āhur anādy eva jīvājīvātmakaṃ jagat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1013: payovato na dadhyatti na payo 'tti dadhivrataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1014: agorasavrato nobhe tasmāt tattvaṃ trayātmakam // HSvs_[7.1]479 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1015: atrāpy abhidadhaty anye viruddhaṃ hi mithastrayam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1016: ekatraivaikadā naitad ghaṭāṃ prāñcati jātucid // HSvs_[7.1]480 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1018: dhrauvyaṃ cobhayaśūnyaṃ yad ekadaikatra tat katham // HSvs_[7.1]481 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1020: tadapy asāmprataṃ yat tad vāsanāhetukaṃ matam // HSvs_[7.1]482 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1021: kiñca syādvādino naiva yujyate niścayaḥ kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1022: svatantrāpekṣayā tasya na mānaṃ mānam eva yat // HSvs_[7.1]483 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1023: saṃsāry api na saṃsārī mukto 'pi na sa eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1026: svarṇān na vānya eveti na viruddhaṃ mithastrayam // HSvs_[7.1]485 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1027: na cotpādavyayau na sto dhrauvyavat taddhiyā gateḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1028: nāstitve tu tayor dhrauvyaṃ tattvato 'stīti na pramā // HSvs_[7.1]486 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1029: na nāsti dhrauvyam apy evam avigānena tadgateḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1030: asyāś ca bhrāntatāyāṃ na jagaty abhrāntatāgatiḥ // HSvs_[7.1]487 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1034: anyathā tritayābhāva ekadaikatra kiṃ na tat // HSvs_[7.1]489 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1036: nyāyyaṃ bhinnanimittatvāt tadabhede na yujyate // HSvs_[7.1]490 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1037: iṣyate ca parair mohāt tat kṣaṇasthitidharmiṇi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1038: abhāve 'nyatam asyāpi tatra tattvaṃ na yad bhavet // HSvs_[7.1]491 //

GR12hsasvrpu:1416: kriyayāvato 'pi yatnena tasmāt jñānād asau matā // HSvs_[11.2]677 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1417: kriyaiva phaladā puṃsāṃ na jñānaṃ phaladaṃ matam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1418: yataḥ strībhakṣyabhogajño na jñānāt sukhino bhavet // HSvs_[11.2]678 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1419: kriyāhīnāś ca yal loke dṛśyante jñānino 'pi hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1422: mūrkhā api hi bhūyāṃso vipaścitsvāmino 'naghāḥ // HSvs_[11.2]680 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1424: nānyathā kevalitve 'pi tad asau tannibandhanā // HSvs_[11.2]681 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1426: tayor api ca tadbhāvaḥ paramārthena nānyathā // HSvs_[11.2]682 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1427: sādhyam arthaṃ parijñāya yadi samyak pravartate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1428: tatas tat sādhayatv eva tathā cāha bṛhaspatiḥ // HSvs_[11.2]683 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1430: tadaprāptāv upāyatvaṃ na tasyā upapadyate // HSvs_[11.2]684 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1431: asādhyārambhiṇas tena samyag jñānaṃ na jātucit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1433: ata evāgamajñasya yā kriyā sā kriyocyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1434: āgamajño 'pi yas tasyāṃ yathāśakti pravartate // HSvs_[11.2]686 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1438: mālatīgandhagaṇavid darbhe na ramate hy aliḥ // HSvs_[11.2]688 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1440: tadbhāva eva tadbhāvāt tadabhāve 'py abhāvataḥ // HSvs_[11.2]689 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1441: na viviktaṃ dvayaṃ samyag etad anyair apīṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1443: baṭharaś ca tapasvī ca śūraś cāpy akṛtavraṇaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1444: madyapā strī satītvaṃ ca rājan na śraddadhāmy aham // HSvs_[11.2]691 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1447: nākarmaṇaḥ kvacij janma yathoktaṃ pūrvasūribhiḥ // HSvs_[11.3]692 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1449: karmabīje tathā dagdhe na rohati bhavāṅkuraḥ // HSvs_[11.3]693 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1451: tadabhāve ca niḥśeṣa-duḥkhābhāvaḥ sadaiva hi // HSvs_[11.3]694 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1457: kṣīṇasaṅgā mahātmānas te sadā sukham āsate // HSvs_[11.3]697 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1458: etā vārtā upaśrutya bhāvayan buddhimān naraḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1462: kṛtvā prakaraṇam etad yad avāptaṃ kiñcid iha mayā kuśalam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1463: bhavavirahabījam anaghaṃ labhatāṃ bhavyo janas tena // HSvs_[11.4]700 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1464: yaṃ buddhaṃ bodhayantaḥ śikhijalamarutas tuṣṭuvur lokavṛttyai jñānaṃ yatrodapādi pratihatabhuvanālokavandhyatvahetu
GR12hsasvrpu:1465: sarvaprāṇisvabhāṣāpariṇatisubhagaṃ kauśalaṃ yasya vācāṃ tasmin devādhideve bhagavati bhavatādhīyatāṃ bhaktirāgaḥ // HSvs_[11.4]701 //
